statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE subscription_status = True;
SELECT user_id, last_activity_date FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_activity_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, subscription_status FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE subscription_status = TRUE ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, subscription_status FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE subscription_status = FALSE AND engagement_score < 50;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score, MIN(engagement_score) AS min_engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, page_view_count FROM UserEngagementMetrics ORDER BY page_view_count DESC
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE interaction_time > 10.5
SELECT user_id, session_id, last_activity_timestamp FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE page_view_count < 100
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE interaction_time BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE session_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, page_view_count FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE interaction_time > 10.5 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability, prediction_date FROM CustomerChurnPrediction WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 AND prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT page_view_count, interaction_time, last_activity_timestamp FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE user_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM CustomerChurnPrediction WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%great%' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC, churn_probability DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_sessions, avg_session_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE total_sessions > 10;
SELECT user_id, prediction_score FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_score >= 0.8;
SELECT user_id, total_purchase_amt, last_purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, total_sessions, avg_session_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE total_sessions < 5;
SELECT user_id, total_sessions, avg_session_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, last_login, total_sessions, avg_session_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, total_purchase_amt, last_purchase_date FROM purchase_history;
SELECT user_id, prediction_score, prediction_date FROM churn_prediction;
SELECT user_id, total_purchase_amt, last_purchase_date, num_purchases FROM purchase_history;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, last_login FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_likelihood > 0.5;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM user_segments ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE name ILIKE 'A%' AND email NOT ILIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics JOIN engagement_logs ON user_engagement_metrics.user_id = engagement_logs.user_id WHERE engagement_logs.action_type = 'login' AND engagement_logs.log_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM user_segments WHERE criteria->>'age' > '25' ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE prediction_date = CURRENT_DATE AND churn_likelihood > 0.5 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, churn_probability FROM churn_predictions WHERE churn_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY churn_probability DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.churn_probability FROM users u JOIN churn_predictions c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.churn_probability > 0.5;
